activityscore_next.message: Keep on rating to reach {NEXT_LEVEL} level!

auto_update_message.message: A new version of WOT is available. Would you like to update your add-on?

bl_description.message: This website appears on a third party blacklist

bl_description_pl.message: This website appears on third party blacklists

bl_information.message: WOT uses third party blacklists to warn users about technical threats such as viruses and malware. Read more

buttons_delete_title.message: Delete my ratings and categories for the website

description_restart.message: Restart the browser to activate WOT.

description_uninstall.message: WOT will be uninstalled after restart.

ext_description.message: WOT helps you find trustworthy websites based on millions of users’ experiences and is one of Chrome’s most popular add-ons.

fbl_optout_text.message: If you prefer not to be asked questions, click "yes"

fbl_whatisthis_text.message: Web of Trust (WOT) is working to promote safety and quality across the web for millions of users. You can help by submitting your opinions whenever you see this prompt.

messages_disabled.message: You have disabled the add-on; click to enable.

messages_error_register.message: Failed to activate the add-on; retrying shortly.

messages_failed.message: Failed to load ratings; retrying shortly

messages_offline.message: Disabled while the browser is offline.

popup_nocattext.message: share your opinion about this website

ratingwindow_categories.message: Pick at least one category to support your rating

ratingwindow_comment.message: Leave a comment to describe your experience with this site

ratingwindow_comment_captchatext.message: You need to enter captcha on the scorecard to publish your comment.

ratingwindow_comment_regtext.message: You need an account to publish your comment.

ratingwindow_commenthints.message:
Be precise

Give evidence or example

Comment according to your real experiences

Do not spam

ratingwindow_invite_rw.message: You can rate websites using this tool. Click on the colored bars to express how much you trust a website.

ratingwindow_newversion.message: New version available - click to update

ratingwindow_novoted.message: Click here to provide a reason for your rating by selecting a category

ratingwindow_question0.message: How much do you trust this site?

ratingwindow_question4.message: How suitable is the website for children?

ratingwindow_wotrating.message: Website's reputation based on user ratings

warnings_message_rating.message: You have given this site a poor rating.

warnings_message_reputation.message: This site has a poor reputation based on user ratings.

warnings_noreasontitle.message: Users have not identified this site yet and only have rated it

warnings_ratesite.message: If you trust this site, please rate it

warnings_rating.message:
You have given this site a poor rating,
which triggered a warning

warnings_reasontitle.message: Users have identified the following issues

warnings_reputation.message:
This website has a poor reputation based on
user ratings

warnings_reratesite.message: Click here if you want to re-rate the site

warnings_unknown.message: This site has an unknown rating

wt_donut_msg.message:
WOT shows you website reputations based on other users’ experiences by showing you traffic light-style icons.

Hover your mouse over the icon to see the reputations and reasons behind them.

wt_intro_0_msg.description: This message appears on introduction welcome tip right after the add-on was installed
wt_intro_0_msg.message:
The new WOT has been added to your browser.

Start rating websites by clicking on this icon {ICO1}

{WT_LEARNMORE}

wt_rw_text.message:
WOT rating window shows you the website reputation based on other users’ experiences.

Now you can rate and comment directly from the updated window.

Start rating by clicking the colored bars.

Learn more about WOT.

wt_warning_text.description: this is a WelcomeTip which is shown when a user sees Warning first time
wt_warning_text.message:
WOT warns you if you land on a site with a poor reputation based on other users’ ratings or blacklists from third parties.

The warning also shows you the reasons behind the poor reputation.

{WT_LEARNMORE}

If you don't want to see warnings, you can turn them off.
